TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlNodeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event can occur only when you call the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to print various properties of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class's <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
[!code-cs[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.serializati_8_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.serializati_8_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownNode Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.xml.serializati_8_1.cpp)]

Docs.summary: Gets the line number of the unknown XML node.
Docs.value: The line number of the unknown XML node.

Docs.summary: Gets the position in the line of the unknown XML node.
Docs.value: The position number of the unknown XML node.

Docs.summary: Gets the XML local name of the XML node being deserialized.
Docs.value: The XML local name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The LocalName property returns the local name (also known as a local part) of an XML qualified name. The LocalName property conforms to the 1999 http://www.w3.org specification `Namespaces in XML`.
## Examples The following example prints the LocalName of an unknown XML node that is encountered when calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class's <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method.
[!code-cs[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.serializati_20_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.serializati_20_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.LocalName Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.serializati_20_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the XML node being deserialized.
Docs.value: The name of the node being deserialized.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example prints the name of the unknown node that caused the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event to occur.
[!code-cs[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.serializati_32_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.serializati_32_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Name Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.serializati_32_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.
Docs.value: The namespace URI that is associated with the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example prints the URI of the unknown XML node that caused the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event to occur.
[!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.serializati_16_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.serializati_16_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NamespaceURI Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.serializati_16_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets the type of the XML node being deserialized.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType> that represents the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType> enumeration returns a description of the node being deserialized. For example, it returns "Comment" if the node is a comment.
## Examples The following example prints a description of the unknown node that caused the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event to occur.
[!code-cs[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.serializati_9_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.serializati_9_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.NodeType Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.serializati_9_1.vb)]

## Examples The following example prints the value returned by the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize%2A> method encounters an unknown XML node.
[!code-cs[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.serializati_1_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.serializati_1_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.serializati_1_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the text of the XML node being deserialized.
Docs.value: The text of the XML node being deserialized.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example prints the text of the unknown XML node that caused the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.UnknownNode> event to occur.
[!code-cs[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Text Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.serializati_4_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Text Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.serializati_4_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventArgs.Text Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.serializati_4_1.cpp)]
